About FioriConf

FioriConf is a free, live, online conference for the Fiori community by the Fiori community. It's all about SAP Fiori.

FioriConf aims to be the conference for every technical Fiori user: developer, architect, consultant, admin. FioriConf is about the poeple that bring Fiori to live at customers. How to get the Fiori app running, deployed, solve real world problems. It is for the people that bring Fiori to life.

You work with Fiori day in and day out? You put Fiori apps into production? You configure technical catalogs, pages and spaces? You define the landscape, governance and guidelines for Fiori apps? You write new, extend or customize Fiori Apps? Use UI flexibility, adaptation or Personas to adopt SAP apps? Either if you are involved in the theory, the implementation or maintenance of Fiori at your employer or customer, FioriConf is made for you!

You are overwhelmed with the amount of products and technologies around Fiori? Searching for an event that focuses only on Fiori, without all the other topics and marketing driven sessions? An event that puts you and your needs into focus? At FioriConf, the content will show how to get from a RAP service to a deployed app. How to roll-out Fiori apps in on-premise and cloud scenarios. How to architect solutions, landscapes and define best practices. What options Fiori provides to enable your end users to benefit with ready to use tools like Personas and bringing Fiori to the mobile world.

FioriConf is intended to be what ABAPConf is for ABAP: give Fiori users a voice at a community driven event. FioriConf bridges the gap between the technical conferences like UI5con and ABAPConf and the official SAP events like TechEd. Coming from the community, the focus is on the current situation at customers, at projects and real live scenarios and solutions.

Conference Features

Community

From the Fiori community, for the Fiori community. Learn, share, connect with fellow Fiori developers, admin and architects. Plus: get in contact with the poeple that define SAP Fiori.

Open

Online, Free, Live. Everyone can join and participate. We try to lower the barriers as much as possible so that every person that works with Fiori can join.

Connect

FioriConf is not only to watch some recorded sessions. It is about interaction: live sessions, asking questions, get to know who is defining Fiori and how is used at customers.

Got questions? We can help: fioriconference@gmail.com
